CustomField.description: This field is populated automatically whenever a child product state config record is created with "LLC_BI__Is_Ready_To_Transmit__c" enabled. This field links to a Product State Config Pivot record which specifies all "states" (stage and status) that are considered Ready to Transmit for this product type in the system. This is used to specify stages that are considered "Ready to Transmit" to the CUSO.
CustomField.label: Product State Config Ready To Transmit
